local_recording.description: Allow hosts and participants to record the meeting using a local file.

cloud_recording.description: Allow hosts to record and save the meeting in the cloud.

record_speaker_view.description: Record the active speaker with a shared screen.

record_gallery_view.description: Record the gallery view with a shared screen.

save_chat_text.description: Save the chat text from the meeting.

show_timestamp.description: Add a timestamp to the recording.

recording_audio_transcript.description: Automatically transcribe the audio of the meeting or webinar to the cloud.

auto_recording.description:
Automatic recording:
`local` - Record on local.
`cloud` - Record on cloud.
`none` - Disabled.

cloud_recording_download_host.description: Only the host can download cloud recordings.

account_user_access_recording.description: Cloud recordings are only accessible to account members. People outside of your organization cannot open links that provide access to cloud recordings.

auto_delete_cmr.description: Allow Zoom to permanantly delete recordings automatically after a specified number of days.

auto_delete_cmr_days.description: When `auto_delete_cmr` function is 'true' this value will set the number of days before the auto deletion of cloud recordings.
